agents.name: Calculation Agent
agents.description: Agent #1: can perform basic mathematical operations like add, subtract, multiply, and divide two numbers.

agents.name: Web Browser Agent
agents.description: Agent #2: capable of browsing the web and extracting information

agents.name: Web Page Fetcher
agents.description: Agent #3: capable of querying a specific webpage to read its content

agents.name: File Analyser Agent
agents.description: Agent #4: capable of understanding complex documents,⚠️⚠️ Is very slow on the online version, is better to use locally

agents.name: Google Documents Agent
agents.description: Agent #5: Will save the conversation to a new doc on Google Docs,⚠️⚠️  Due to complex credentials management it is currently unasable on the streamlit version and will be replaced by day 1 Calculations Agent
